name: POSCO
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to international trade and foreign direct investment.
FY 2021 Commerce-Justice-Science appropriations issues related to Section 232 tariffs and the use of particular market situation in AD/CVD proceedings.
FY 2022 Commerce-Justice-Science appropriations issues related to implementation of Section 232 exclusions.
Issues related to the implementation of Section 232 exclusions in the FY 2022 Commerce-Justice-Science appropriations bill (H.R. 4505).
Issues related to the implementation of Section 232 exclusions in the FY 2022 Commerce-Justice-Science appropriations bill (H.R. 4505/S. 3042).

Issues related to international trade and foreign direct investment, including issues related to Section 232 duties on steel and the Eliminating Global Market Distortions To Protect American Jobs Act of 2021 (S. 1187/H.R. 6121).
Issues related to international trade and foreign direct investment, including issues related to Section 232 measures.
